revised_title: An Uncommon Disease among the Indians in Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard
tldr: In 1763, an extraordinary disease affected the Native American population in the islands of Nantucket and Martha's Vineyard, causing a high mortality rate among those with Indian blood. The disease did not affect the English population, despite their close contact with the affected Indians. The cause of the disease remains unclear, but it is suggested that it might be part of the "Arcana of Providence."
